title: Implementing AWS CDK Log Notification Pattern for Error Logs
description: Implementing AWS CDK Log Notification Pattern for Error Logs

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Monitoring logs for errors is crucial for maintaining the reliability and performance of cloud-based applications. AWS offers services like CloudWatch Logs for log management and Amazon SNS for notification delivery. By combining these services, you can set up automated error detection and notification systems, ensuring that you're promptly alerted to any issues in your applications
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
